root.name: Wangan Midnight
root.description: OverviewWangan Midnight is a racing game based on the manga Wangan Midnight and focuses on the high speed races in said manga. This game is created by Genki, creator fo the Tokyo Xtreme Racer series. This is the second Wangan Midnight game that has been released for home consoles. The first one with the same name was released on the PS2 in 2002 and a sequel to this game has been made for the PSP a little while later called Wangan Midnight Portable.Â A story mode as well as some tuning and arcade modes are present in this game. For the PS3, an online mode is available for up to four players total. All cars presented in this game are all licensed cars from Japanese makers.This game is no way related to Namco Bandai's arcade racer Wangan Maximum Tune series, so the way the game is presented as well as the driving physics are totally different. The game features voice acting for the characters and are the same voice actors as the ones in the Japanese anime.
